select temp.* from ( select ID, VAR_3 as "firstAgentNo", VAR_4 as "firstAgentName", sum(dec_17 + dec_18 + dec_19) as "income" , sum(dec_18 + dec_19) as "expend" , sum(dec_17 + dec_18 + dec_19) - sum(dec_18 + dec_19) as "profit" from

GROUP BY VAR_7 ) as temp where temp.firstAgentNo != '' and temp.firstAgentNo = #{agentNo} and temp.firstAgentName like '%${agentName}%' and temp.agentLevel = #{agentLevel} and (temp.parentAgentNo = #{parentAgentNo} or temp.parentUpAgentNo = #{parentAgentNo}) and (temp.parentAgentName like '%${parentAgentName}%' or temp.parentUpAgentName like '%${parentAgentName}%')

mapper.insert: insert into ( VERSION, CREATE_TIME, REPORT_TYPE, STAT_DATE, TRX_DATE, VAR_1, VAR_2, VAR_3, VAR_4, VAR_5, VAR_6, VAR_7, VAR_8, VAR_9, VAR_10, VAR_11, VAR_12, INT_1, DEC_1, INT_2, DEC_2, INT_3, DEC_3, DEC_11, DEC_12, DEC_13, DEC_14, DEC_15, DEC_16, DEC_17, DEC_18, DEC_19, DEC_20, INT_4,VAR_13,VAR_14 ) select 0, #{dateTime}, #{reportType}, #{statDate}, #{transDate}, t.merchantno, t.merchantname, t.first_agent_no, t.first_agent_name, t.second_agent_no, t.second_agent_name, t.third_agent_no, t.third_agent_name, a.bankaccountno, a.bankaccountname, a.bankchannelno, bankname, sum(2 - t.debitflag ), sum(t.amount*(2 - t.debitflag)), sum(t.debitflag - 1), sum(t.amount*(t.debitflag - 1)), count(t.channelno), sum(t.amount*(3 - 2 * t.debitflag)), sum(t.merchantfee), sum(t.amount*(3 - 2 * t.debitflag)) - sum(t.merchantfee), sum(t.bankfee), sum(t.instfee), sum(t.agentfee), 0 , sum(t.first_agent_fee), sum(t.second_agent_fee), sum(t.third_agent_fee), sum( CASE WHEN CONCAT(t.SETTLE_TYPE, t.T0_PROCESS_STATUS) = '1100' then (t.amount * 0.002) else 0 end ), (case when t.SETTLE_TYPE = 1 and t.T0_PROCESS_STATUS = 100 then 1 when t.SETTLE_TYPE = 1 and t.T0_PROCESS_STATUS != 100 then 2 else t.SETTLE_TYPE end) as sett_type, t.channelno, c.channel_name from POS_PP_TRANS t,TBL_USER_BANK_ACCOUNT a,POS_PB_CHANNEL_INFO c where t.channelno = c.channel_code and t.merchantno = a.userno and t.respcode = '00' and t.debitflag in (1,2) and t.settledate = #{fieldDate} group by t.merchantno,t.settledate, sett_type,t.channelno
